title: Emit first-session objective contract in frontend snapshot generator
description: Extend the manifest snapshot generator so first-session objective contract rows are emitted from backend manifest/seed data and validated for ordering, canonical-default key usage, and alias lookup policy.
acceptance_criteria: Generated snapshot includes a first-session objective contract block sourced from manifest/seed data with no hard-coded objective row constants
Generator fails with deterministic diagnostics on duplicate objective ids, invalid step order, or compatibility-only key default selection
Objective contract emission and validation are covered by targeted tests and the standard narrative snapshot test suite

title: Drive objective-strip rendering from snapshot objective contract rows
description: Refactor client objective-strip and completion-gate logic to read objective rows from the frontend snapshot payload, removing hard-coded objective contract arrays while preserving deterministic fallback behavior.
acceptance_criteria: Objective strip reads canonical objective ids, loop steps, and gate key requirements from snapshot data instead of in-file constants
Compatibility alias objective keys resolve through deterministic lookup-only mapping and never replace canonical defaults
First-slice loop smoke remains green and objective progression still renders six ordered steps with active/completed states

title: Generate release-readiness checklist and known-issues artifacts from gate evidence
description: Add a deterministic release artifact generator that converts first-slice gate evidence into release-readiness checklist and known-issues markdown outputs required by vertical-slice done criteria.
acceptance_criteria: A deterministic command generates `release-readiness-checklist.md` and `known-issues.md` under `coordination/runtime/first-slice-release-gate/`
Checklist covers playable, scope, quality, platform, and release-readiness gates with explicit PASS/FAIL/N/A status and artifact references
Known issues output includes severity/owner placeholders for failing mandatory gates or explicit `none` when all gates pass

title: Run release-blocking gate after objective-contract snapshot integration
description: Execute the release gate after objective-contract snapshot and release-readiness artifact changes, publish PASS/FAIL evidence, and disposition the stale blocked release-gate artifact with explicit rationale.
acceptance_criteria: Release-gate evidence records PASS/FAIL for mandatory stages and includes release-readiness checklist + known-issues artifact links
Blocked item `RK-AUTO-BACKLOG-0010-F06` is explicitly dispositioned as completed or superseded with a concrete rationale
Any failing mandatory stage produces owner_role-tagged blocker notes with exact failing command/output path

title: Resolve queue dependency stall
description: The daemon detected queued work items that are not dependency-ready due to unmet dependencies (blocked, cyclic, or otherwise unresolved). Review blocked items and dependency graph health, requeue/close obsolete items, and restore runnable work.
acceptance_criteria: At least one dependency-stalled queued item is made runnable or explicitly closed
Blocked/obsolete queue artifacts are documented or consolidated
Backlog no longer stalls immediately on next daemon run
